item.title: Vandalised Parking Signs Z88, 24th October
item.description:
The synagogue on Braydon road continuously spray paints the permit signs. It is unfair that us resident didn't vote for paid parking have to pay to park in front of their own homes and they get to park for free. Please fix the sign and have ticket men come
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walsham Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Misc Flytipping, 24th October
item.description:
There is a collection of rubbish that has been left along a wall near 1 Fernholme Road SE153EF, including a desk, four chairs, various books and carpet remnants. Three Southwark bins have also been abandoned there for several years now and don't belong to any locals.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fernholme Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Acacia tree shoots blocking path. 2nd request no action, 24th October
item.description:
Public Acacia tree in path situated between 4 and 5 Acacia Close. 2nd request as shoots coming from base of tree blocking path. Shoots have very large up to 4/5 in spikes causing a very dangerous problem. The tarmac on edge of road was replaced very recently. Why I don’t know. BUT no action was taken regarding the shoots breaking through the pathway. No one can get pass this tree and you have to go into the road to get by. My husband is elderly and would need to go into the road on his disability car. This tree problem happens every year. Surely the care of this acacia tree should be investigated each year as a matter of people’s safety. I have to report this problem every year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Acacia Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
